Class ABuffer

java.lang.Object
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.Filter
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.audiofilters.AudioFilter
it.disi.unitn.videocreator.filtergraph.filterchain.filters.audiofilters.abuffer.ABuffer
public class ABuffer extends AudioFilter
This class implements FFmpeg's "abuffer" filter. This filter must be used in conjunction with a ffmpeg command trying to process a video.

  • Method Details

    • setTimeBase

      public void setTimeBase(@NotNull @NotNull String time_base) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets this filter's time_base parameter.
      Parameters:
      time_base - The given time_base value. This value cannot be null or an empty string, and it has to be in the form num/den.
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given value is null or an empty string

    • setTimeBase

      public void setTimeBase(float num, float den)
      This method sets the time_base parameter's value as a floating-point number given a fraction's numerator and denominator.
      Parameters:
      num - The numerator.
      den - The denominator.

    • setChannels

      public void setChannels(int channels) throws InvalidArgumentException
      Sets the number of channels.
      Parameters:
      channels - The given number of channels. This value must be greater than or equal to 1.
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - If the given number of channels is less than or equal to zero
